title: Nocturne's Tail
body: Ok, so when you're playing as Nocturne (there may be other champions effected in a similar way) and you press alt+tab to 'Tab Out' and come back, Nocturne's tail is gone for the rest of the game. The same thing happens when you change the graphics settings and come back.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! Lemme see what's going on with his tail. ^-^
Hey! Thanks for taking the time to reply to my comment!

His tails been bugged in one way or another practically since he came out.
Not too long ago a Rioter, might have been Katey, said it's basically not a big enough deal to get fixed anytime soon.
